meanings.sent1: The banqueter enjoyed the delicious food at the banquet.
meanings.sent2: The banqueter sat at the table with other guests during the banquet.
meanings.sent3: The banqueter accidentally spilled sauce on their fancy outfit at the banquet.
meanings.sent4: The banqueter's appetite was a bottomless pit at the banquet.
meanings.sent5: The banqueter's laughter filled the banquet hall with joy.

meanings.definition: To attend or participate in banquets.
meanings.sent1: She will banqueter at the event next week.
meanings.sent2: They banquetered at the fancy hotel last night.
meanings.sent3: He banquetered with enthusiasm, trying every dish at the feast.
meanings.sent4: The family banquetered together, celebrating a special occasion.
meanings.sent5: The guests banquetered merrily, enjoying the festive atmosphere.
